definition: to serve the ball/to tee off
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Objective To explain the diagnosis and treatment of retrobulbar hematoma after baggy eye-plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍眼袋成形术并发球后血肿的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: It's a mix between football, basketball and hockey with trampolines thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 有包括橄榄球，篮球以及曲棍球，利用蹦床弹跳发球。

sentences.english: Wang Dayong though Ding Song's service was hidden and very hard to judge.
sentences.chinese: 王大勇认为丁松的发球具有隐蔽性，很难判断。

sentences.english: Ronald confused Denton again with his serve.
sentences.chinese: 罗纳德的发球又一次使丹顿不知所措。

sentences.english: Her service has improved,and I can hardly receive it.
sentences.chinese: 她的发球技术已经改进了，我几乎接不住她发的球。

sentences.english: Have you booked your tee-off time?
sentences.chinese: 你预订了你的发球时间了吗？

sentences.english: The first old man stepped up to the tee and hit.
sentences.chinese: 第一个老家伙走到发球区，打了一杆。

sentences.english: After serving out the first set, Li broke in the opening game of the second set.
sentences.chinese: 拿下第一盘之后，李娜在第二盘破发对手一个发球局。

sentences.english: He only won five more points on Murray's serve the rest of the way.
sentences.chinese: 在随后穆雷的发球局中，他只赢得了五分。

sentences.english: The side winning a game shall serve first in the next game.
sentences.chinese: 本局胜方将获得下一局的发球权。

sentences.english: The tees, landing areas and greens are all placed away from where runoff will collect.
sentences.chinese: 发球台，落点区，果岭都要远离会被冲刷的区域。

sentences.english: Serving and volleying are the basic elements of the game.
sentences.chinese: 发球和往返连续击球是这项运动的基本内容。

sentences.english: Mirnyi's powerful serve and volley game proved ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 米尔尼的强力发球和网前截击显得并不十分有效。

sentences.english: It was a tough walk because the green was higher than the tee.
sentences.chinese: 他走得非常艰难，因为果岭要比发球处地势高些。

sentences.english: You know, it will be tough. But I feel good about the way I'm playing right now.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得今天我的发球要比那天对阵科利亚时好很多。

sentences.english: Rafael Nadal serves to John Isner during the BNP Paribas Open in California.
sentences.chinese: 在加州法国巴黎银行公开赛上纳达尔向伊斯内尔发球。

definition: to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc)/to block
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to cross a border/to go out of bounds (sport)
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
